entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
